data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,181 believers in the state of Marijampoles to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Marijampoles, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Marijampoles, Lithuania from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 19 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Marijampoles, Lithuania.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, guide the 2,181 believers in the state of Marijampoles into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Marijampoles to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Azerbaijani people might believe through him.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Marijampoles, Lithuania not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Marijampoles, Lithuania to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Marijampoles
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
